name: Ch.10ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Gilliam;Good morning Kyle.|Here for guard duty?
speak;Kyle;Correct.|Looks like we are both on guard duty for this morning.
speak;Gilliam;Good to have you.|By the way, your armor looks extra shiny today.
speak;Kyle;Yeah, I had extra time to polish my armor this morning.|Your armor is looking pretty shiny yourself.
speak;Gilliam;Thank you.|I take pride in my armor.|I make sure it's good to go in any occasion.
speak;Kyle;That's very admirable, Gilliam.|Say, what do you do to try to mitigate magical attacks?|I have a hard time dealing against those...|Even my armor doesn't do much against spells...
speak;Gilliam;I'll be honest Kyle...|I have a hard time against magical attacks too...
speak;Kyle;I see...|Maybe we can see if Lute can teach us anything?
speak;Gilliam;Hmm...|Yeah, she might be able to help.
speak;Kyle;Wait one minute.|I'll go get her.
speak;Lute;You two want to know how to resist magical attacks?
speak;Gilliam;Correct.|Anything that you can teach us will be very helpful.
speak;Lute;Hmmm...|I have been wanting to test a new method that may work for the two of you.|It involves getting shocked by Mogall tentacles multiple times.|Hold on, I'll go grab them...
speak;Kyle;I think this may have been a mistake...
alert;Gilliam and Kyle's RES growths has increased!
